title: [Alexys' Magic Shoppe]
description: Enclosed by blue-speckled sea glass walls, the shop features a potted palm tree in the center of its bamboo floor.  A tiny sand bottle display hangs under the skylight-set ceiling.  Right near the front is a shell-lined bamboo counter and an oversized sea chest.

Beneath a low skylight-set ceiling, a tiny sand bottle display hangs on one of the blue-speckled sea glass walls.  A shell-lined bamboo counter and an oversized sea chest sit in opposite corners while a potted palm tree rests on a glazed bamboo floor.
